title: Pet Friendly, one and two Bedroom Apartment homes
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
You feel it even before you see it.
A sense of wonder: leafy trees and vast blue skies catch your eye, as if for the first time.
A spirit of refreshment: genuine kindness from our helpful staff, and an atmosphere of calm throughout.
You glance around, in awe of so much… space.
Private entryways wind toward buildings which tower more like townhomes than the crammed apartments you’re used to.
Interiors gleam with that “freshly done” feel: refinished kitchen cabinets; gray appliances; wood-look flooring, just the way you like.
Tranquil as it is, it’s almost shocking that the freeways sit so close: M-5, I-275, I-696 and I-96 all within one mile for when your 9-5 beckons toward Troy, Detroit or Novi.
As the weekend draws near, you can’t wait to stroll through downtown Farmington for live music and local fare.
Welcome to Spring Valley Apartments: a breath of fresh air, and a place you’re proud to call home.
DEPOSIT & FEES:$250 non-refundable fee--PET RENT:$30/month for 1 pet$40/month for 2 pets(per pet, 2 max allowed)
Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Garbage disposal, Range/Oven, Full size washer and dryer
Sunrooms in select apartments, Balcony/patio in select apartments
Fitness center, Tennis court, Outdoor pool
Fireplace on all second floors, Extended faux-wood flooring in select apartments, Renovated kitchens in select apartments
